name: noagame
description: Starter examples of game worlds using the noa voxel engine

scripts.start: node clean.js && node build-assets.js && npm run prefixcss && node esbuild.js
scripts.start_old: npm run build && cd src && webpack serve
scripts.build_old: node clean.js && node build-assets.js && npm run prefixcss && cd src && webpack --env prod

author: Meow
